pullRequest.body:
In particular `P.diagonal` is local at the source if `P` is and `P` is sufficiently compatible with open immersions.

---

### PR summary [7b93e0970b](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/21390/commits/7b93e0970be66177982bd64342905decb4cb22f8)

#### Import changes for modified files

<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ HasOfPostcompProperty.of_le`
`+ HasOfPrecompProperty.of_le`
`+ IsStableUnderBaseChange.hasOfPostcompProperty_monomorphisms`
`+ IsStableUnderCobaseChange.hasOfPrecompProperty_epimorphisms`
`+ hasOfPostcompProperty_isOpenImmersion_of_morphismRestrict`
`+ instance (P : MorphismProperty Scheme)`
`+ instance (P : MorphismProperty Scheme) [P.IsStableUnderBaseChange] :`
`+ preimage_opensRange`
`+ pullback.comp_diagonal`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

---

<details><summary>No changes to technical debt.</summary>

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
* The `relative` value is the weighted *sum* of the differences with weight given by the *inverse* of the current value of the statistic.
* The `absolute` value is the `relative` value divided by the total sum of the inverses of the current values (i.e. the weighted *average* of the differences).
</details>
🚀 Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by erdOne.
This probably could be a separate lemma near `pullback.diagonal_comp`.

```suggestion
instance (P : MorphismProperty Scheme) [P.IsStableUnderBaseChange] :
```
I think `P.IsStableUnderBaseChange` implies `P.RespectsIso`.

And this is a consequence of general categorical nonsense
```
lemma foo [P.IsStableUnderBaseChange] :
    P.HasOfPostcompProperty (monomorphisms C) := by
  refine ⟨fun {Y X S} g f (hf : Mono f) hcomp ↦ ?_⟩
  have : g = (asIso (pullback.fst (g ≫ f) f)).inv ≫ pullback.snd _ _ := by
    rw [Iso.eq_inv_comp, ← cancel_mono f]; simp [pullback.condition]
  rw [this, cancel_left_of_respectsIso (P := P)]
  exact P.pullback_snd _ _ hcomp
```
The full section assumes `HasPullbacks C`, so these are not needed. We might want to clean the section up and put explicit `HasPullbacks` everywhere, but for now I just removed the duplication.

```suggestion
@[reassoc]
lemma pullback.comp_diagonal (f : X ⟶ Y) (g : Y ⟶ Z) :
```

pullRequest.title: chore(AlgebraicGeometry): more API for local at source
